Observed at: Campbell River Airport 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 70 gusting to 90 before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 70 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 40 in the afternoon except 60 over exposed coastal sections. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low 7.
